name: Modify the object. Calculate the sum of the properties
instruction:
Write a function `calculateSumObject` that takes an object.

The object has three properties:
* `n1` - number
* `n2` - number
* `sum` - number zero

An example of an object that will be passed to the function:
```javascript
{
  n1: 10,
  n2: 20,
  sum: 0
}
```

The function should return an object in which the `sum` property is equal to the sum of the `n1` and `n2` properties of the object.

An example of running the function:
```javascript
calculateSumObject({n1: 10, n2: 20, sum: 0}) // { n1: 10, n2: 20, sum: 30 }
```
